function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Over-exposure to Covid-19 for women in health and social services sector","Impact":"Increased risk of contamination and health hazards for women","Mitigation":"Providing adequate protective gear and training to reduce the risk of contamination","Technologies":"Personal protective equipment (PPE), training programs for infection control","People":"Women working in health and social services sector","Owner":"Health organizations, government"},{"Description":"Threats to income for women in informal economy","Impact":"Financial instability and economic hardship for women","Mitigation":"Implementing financial support programs and resources for women in the informal economy","Technologies":"Microfinance programs, economic empowerment initiatives","People":"Women in informal economy","Owner":"Government, financial institutions"},{"Description":"Uneven impact of the disease on women's economic activities","Impact":"Threatened economic activities and livelihoods for women, especially in developing countries","Mitigation":"Supporting small businesses and economic activities of women, especially in developing countries","Technologies":"Microcredit, business development programs","People":"Women in small businesses, especially in developing countries","Owner":"Government, non-profit organizations"}]}
